attributes.action: Surprise, Surprise? Rejected Again!  a Message of Support to Mr & Mrs Jeff, Peggy Hubbard And the American Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr.& Mrs. Hubbard have now lost another son in Iraq,Coporal Nathan Hubbard, whom died in an accident on board a helicopter with 16 other service men.
They already lost Jared Hubbard in 2004, killed in action.
Jeff & Peggy have been left with one son serving in the Armed Forces, Spc Jason Hubbard, whom has been recalled to America.
Please send condolences to this brave family.
They fully support the "people in power" that is the American Government,they have not lost faith thay Iraq will improve and regain its democratic freedom.
This family has unselfishly lost 2 sons for their Country may "God bless them".

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
